=== Administrative Procedure ===

To add more specifications to this page, please use the following procedure

# Verify that you will be attending UDS (either physically or virtually)
# Register a specification on launchpad from <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+addspec]]</nowiki>
# Fill out at least the Summary, Release Note, Rationale, and Use Cases on the SpecTemplate under the https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Specs/ namespace, using the CamelCase form of the blueprint name for the URL
# Add an UbuntuSpec: link to the blueprint on this page
# Subscribe <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~davidm|David Mandala]]</nowiki> to the specification

The deadline for submissions is 6th November (0:00 UTC)
